divs: Sighting Detailswhilst searching for houses to let in the bristol area i came across this street view photo i copied it but the one on google earth has a lot more detail when u zoom in have a lookat the camera view on salcombe road bristol uk look at the cameras sayinying 37 salcombe road go to the ones near the cross roads and find house with door number 72 a lampost is in front of it and in the sky to the right is a large object on zooming in its a blueish colour boomarang round , with black in middle and sticky up ariel and a black dot. then look to the right of it till you reach the corner house front roof peaks there is two small objects could be birds or couls be stealth bommbers on close zoom maybe you can enhance the google photo beter but it is very odd looking and first object looks like its in sky away from lampost.Please email me back if you can with enhanced photo that you do as this is very interesting as I say the one Im sending is a copy if u view on street view google earth there is a lot more detail. thanks
